name: Aether Knights: Hindered Spirit
description:
Enter Zelle's journey and reclaim what was lost!

Aether Knight - Hindered Spirit was submitted to the Metroidvania Jam on March 19th, 2019. Unlock new powers and traverse the world - can you revitalize Zelle's spirit?

Keyboard Controls:

Space = Jump (jump in air), Glide (in air)
A = Left
D = Right
S = Crouch
W = Look up
F = Dash (can be used in air)
Mouse 1 = Shoot/Attack
Mouse 2 or Q = Jet pack (hold)
Left Ctrl = Sprint/Run (hold)
T = Switch Weapon
I = Inventory

Credits:

Audio by Forte and Joshua McLean
Art by Canetoonist and Antoniomonteiro
Code and Design by Akusan 
Using Corgi Engine and Fungus
